ignore_tmp.name: Ignore temp files
ignore_tmp.description: Never notify for files saved to temp directories.

enforce_transient.name: Always automatically dismiss notifications
enforce_transient.description: All notifications will automatically be dismissed after the specified timeout

transient_before_time.name: Automatically dismiss quick downloads
transient_before_time.description: Automatically dismiss downloads completed quicker than this time (in ms). Set to 0 to never automatically dismiss downloads.

notif_timeout.name: Notification Timeout
notif_timeout.description: When a notification is set to automatically be dismissed, set the timeout to this value (in ms).

no_notify_shorter_than.name: Don't Notify For Quick Downloads
no_notify_shorter_than.description: Don't send a notification for downloads quicker than this time (in seconds). If set to zero, no notifications will be skipped.

notif_sound.name: Audio Notifications
notif_sound.description: Play an audio cue with every notification
